subject: Demonstrations, Protests, and Riots
Olympic Games (2014)
Officiating (Sports)
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Dozens gathered in Moscow on Monday to protest a disallowed goal that helped the United States go on to beat the Russian team on Saturday at the Sochi Games.
snippet: Dozens gathered in Moscow on Monday to protest a disallowed goal that helped the United States go on to beat the Russian team on Saturday at the Sochi Games.
